definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_set_rotation"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="yaw"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">90</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_nbt_num_set"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">DropCount</field></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="math_random_int_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">6</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">DropCount is : </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">DropCount</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
